GSD.description:
ath11k: pci: fix crash on suspend if board file is not found

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit aeed776c00e804a0f7896db39c7c661cea34ee1f. For more details please see the references link.
